annotations.title: Coconut and Lime Margarita Recipe | Williams Sonoma Taste

textContent:
2 lime wedges
1.5 oz. (60 ml) coconut cream or cream of coconut  
2 oz (60 ml) blanco tequila  
1 oz. (30 ml) fresh lime juice 
1/2 oz. (15 ml) Cointreau

Shake and garnish with lime wedge

https://blog.williams-sonoma.com/coconut-cream-lime-margarita/
title: Coconut Creme Margarita
